alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Robertson; Sumner; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 11:19AM CDT until August 12 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL DAVIDSON...SOUTHWESTERN SUMNER...NORTHWESTERN WILSON AND SOUTHEASTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 1118 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Greenbrier to near Joelton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Lebanon, Springfield, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Lakewood, Ridgetop, Hermitage, Rural Hill, Belinda City, Old Hickory, Joelton, Green Hill and Whites Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 207 and 208, and between mile markers 215 and 230. Interstate 65 between mile markers 85 and 108. Interstate 24 between mile markers 33 and 49. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
